entry.title: Transition Year at UCD Conway Institute

link.title: Transition Year at UCD Conway Institute

entry.content:
I had the pleasure of work with Transition Year students at the UCD Conway Institute, talking about my daily work as a scientist and delivering some workshops on coding. Take a look at the tweets by Amgen Biotech:

Thank you to researchers from @sysbioire @UCD_Conway @CharlesUCD who worked with and inspired transition year students this week. @HugoGuillen @tanwi_vartak @LefeivreT @ANwaokorie @TheRealPDogue @serviveforlife 1/2 pic.twitter.com/qiSm0hCTIo

— Amgen Biotech Experience Ireland (@abe_ireland) November 19, 2021

And @DaniGalvinNeuro, Cara Gaffney, @MarziaPendino, Jillian Scully, Ciara Lynch @biOrbic_centre, Elaine Waters, @JadejaShahnawaz and Tina Uroda. Thank you all! pic.twitter.com/Dt1SgrX1XR

— Amgen Biotech Experience Ireland (@abe_ireland) November 19, 2021
entry.summary: I had the pleasure of work with Transition Year students at the UCD Conway Institute, talking about my daily work as a scientist and delivering some workshops on coding. Take a look at the tweets by Amgen Biotech: Thank you to researchers from @sysbioire @UCD_Conway @CharlesUCD who worked with and inspired transition year students this week. @HugoGuillen @tanwi_vartak @LefeivreT @ANwaokorie @TheRealPDogue @serviveforlife 1/2 pic.twitter.com/qiSm0hCTIo— Amgen Biotech Experience Ireland (@abe_ireland) November 19, 2021 And @DaniGalvinNeuro, Cara Gaffney, @MarziaPendino, Jillian Scully, Ciara Lynch @biOrbic_centre, Elaine Waters, @JadejaShahnawaz and Tina Uroda. Thank you all! pic.twitter.com/Dt1SgrX1XR— Amgen Biotech Experience Ireland (@abe_ireland) November 19, 2021

entry.title: Six Marie Skłodowska-Curie fellows are coming to the University of Bern

link.title: Six Marie Skłodowska-Curie fellows are coming to the University of Bern

entry.content:
Media release regarding my Marie Curie fellowship for the University of Bern.

“The University of Bern is welcoming six Marie Skłodowska-Curie fellows this year. The “Marie Skłodowska-Curie Individual Fellowships”, awarded annually by the European Commission, give experienced researchers the opportunity to enrich their scientific careers with a stay abroad.”

Link to the full article.
entry.summary: The University of Bern is welcoming six Marie Skłodowska-Curie fellows this year. The "Marie Skłodowska-Curie Individual Fellowships", awarded annually by the European Commission, give experienced researchers the opportunity to enrich their scientific careers with a stay abroad.
